title: Global Keywords
description: The Global Keywords in CSS, such as 'inherit', 'initial', 'unset' and 'revert', provide default values for properties.
content: The special values that can be applied to any property include `inherit`, which takes the parent's value; `initial`, which resets to the default; `unset`, which behaves as `inherit` or `initial` depending on the property; and `revert`, which restores the value from the user-agent stylesheet or less specific styles.
